Item ID1175

An Iron square shield is the second weakest square shield in RuneScape. A player with 23 Smithing can make the shield by using two iron bars on an anvil while carrying a hammer, granting 50 experience. This shield can also be bought at Cassie's Shield Shop in northern Falador.
